targets.rawSql:
select  CONCAT(case when to_char(a.fecha, 'd') = '1' then 'DOMINGO'
                    when to_char(a.fecha, 'd') = '2' then 'LUNES'
                    when to_char(a.fecha, 'd') = '3' then 'MARTES'
                    when to_char(a.fecha, 'd') = '4' then 'MIERCOLES'
                    when to_char(a.fecha, 'd') = '5' then 'JUEVES'
                    when to_char(a.fecha, 'd') = '6' then 'VIERNES'
                    when to_char(a.fecha, 'd') = '7' then 'SABADO'
                    end
 
        ,CHR(13),to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YYYY')) as fecham,
        to_char(a.fecha, 'YYYY-mm-dd')  as fechao , 
        count(a.fecha) as total
  from gestion.caso a
  inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
  inner join gestion.estatus f on f.id = a.id_estatus
  inner JOIN  gestion.category j ON j.id = a.id_sub_categoria
  where $__timeFilter(a.fecha)
	and b.nombre in ($estado) AND c.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
	and j.name in ($subcategoria)
	and f.nombre in ($estatus)
  group by fecham,fechao order by fechao

panels.title: HISTÓRICO DE CASOS RECIBIDO EN EL SISTEMA DESDE LA VENAPP (ÚLTIMOS DÍAS)

targets.rawSql: SELECT

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
	where b.id_resolutorio in (387,388,389,390,391,392,393,394,395,396,397,398,399,400,401,402,403,405,358) 
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
	and b.principal is true	and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
where b.id_resolutorio in (353)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado

inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia

and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado

inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and a.id_sub_categoria in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (2)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and a.id_sub_categoria in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)
SELECT

-- Porcentaje de Eficiencia Casos Cerrados
SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (-- Casos Recibidos
                                            SELECT count(a.id)
                                            FROM gestion.caso a
                      inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id		
											inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
											inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
											inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia											
                                            where b.id_resolutorio in (387,388,389,390,391,392,393,394,395,396,397,398,399,400,401,402,403,405,358) 
											                      and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
                                            and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) )::decimal, 2) as porcentaje
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	where b.id_resolutorio in (387,388,389,390,391,392,393,394,395,396,397,398,399,400,401,402,403,405,358) 
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
	and b.principal is true	and a.id_estatus in (6) 
	and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (SELECT count(a.id)
                                           FROM gestion.caso a
                                           inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                           inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
                                           inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
                                           inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
                                           where b.id_resolutorio in (353)
                                           and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
                                           and b.principal is true
                                           and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8))::decimal, 2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
where b.id_resolutorio in (353)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

                                           inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
                                           inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
                                           inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
                                           where b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
                                           and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id) 
                                            FROM gestion.caso a
                                            inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                            inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
                                            inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio

inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia

and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (SELECT count(a.id)
                                           FROM gestion.caso a
                                           inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                           inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
                                           inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
                                           inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia

inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia

SELECT trunc((count(a.id)::decimal * 100) / ( SELECT count(a.id)
                                              FROM gestion.caso a
                                              inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                              inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
                                              inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
                                              inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
                                              where b.id_resolutorio in (357)
                                              and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
                                              and b.principal is true
                                              and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) )::decimal,2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
where b.id_resolutorio in (357)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
												inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
                        inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
                        inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
												where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1)
												and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
												and a.id_sub_categoria in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)
												and b.principal is true
												and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
		inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
    inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
    inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1)
		and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
		and a.id_sub_categoria in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)
		and b.principal is true
		and a.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
												inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
                        inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
                        inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
												where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (2)
												and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
												and a.id_sub_categoria in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)
												and b.principal is true
												and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
		inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
    inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
    inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (2)
		and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
		and a.id_sub_categoria in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)
		and b.principal is true
		and a.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	where b.id_resolutorio in (387,388,389,390,391,392,393,394,395,396,397,398,399,400,401,402,403,405,358) 
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
	and b.principal is true	and a.id_estatus in (6) 
	and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
where b.id_resolutorio in (353)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
where b.id_resolutorio in (359)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
where b.id_resolutorio in (361)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
where b.id_resolutorio in (369)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
where b.id_resolutorio in (357)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and a.id_sub_categoria in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6) 
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (2)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
and a.id_sub_categoria in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6) 
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

select  CONCAT(case when to_char(a.fecha, 'd') = '1' then 'DOMINGO'
                    when to_char(a.fecha, 'd') = '2' then 'LUNES'
                    when to_char(a.fecha, 'd') = '3' then 'MARTES'
                    when to_char(a.fecha, 'd') = '4' then 'MIERCOLES'
                    when to_char(a.fecha, 'd') = '5' then 'JUEVES'
                    when to_char(a.fecha, 'd') = '6' then 'VIERNES'
                    when to_char(a.fecha, 'd') = '7' then 'SABADO'
                    end
 
        ,CHR(13),to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YYYY')) as fecham,
        to_char(a.fecha, 'YYYY-mm-dd')  as fechao , 
        count(a.fecha) as total
  from gestion.caso a
  inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
  inner join gestion.estatus f on f.id = a.id_estatus
  inner JOIN  gestion.category j ON j.id = a.id_sub_categoria
  where $__timeFilter(a.fecha)
	and b.nombre in ($estado) AND c.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
	and j.name in ($subcategoria)
	and a.id_estatus = 5  --f.nombre in ($estatus)
  group by fecham,fechao order by fechao

panels.title: HISTÓRICO DE CASOS DEVUELTO A VENAPP DESDE EL SISTEMA (ÚLTIMOS DÍAS)

list.definition: SELECT a.nombre  FROM gestion.municipio a inner join gestion.estado b on a.id_estado = b.id where  b.nombre in ($estado)
list.label: Municipio
list.name: municipio
list.query: SELECT a.nombre  FROM gestion.municipio a inner join gestion.estado b on a.id_estado = b.id where  b.nombre in ($estado)

list.definition:
SELECT a.nombre FROM gestion.parroquia a 
	inner join gestion.municipio b on a.id_municipio = b.id 
	inner join gestion.estado c on c.id = b.id_estado
	where  c.nombre in ($estado)  and b.nombre in ($municipio)
list.label: Parroquia
list.name: parroquia
list.query:
SELECT a.nombre FROM gestion.parroquia a 
	inner join gestion.municipio b on a.id_municipio = b.id 
	inner join gestion.estado c on c.id = b.id_estado
	where  c.nombre in ($estado)  and b.nombre in ($municipio)

list.definition: select name from gestion.category  -- where id in (8)

list.name: subcategoria
list.query: select name from gestion.category  -- where id in (8)

list.definition: select nombre from gestion.estatus where id!=5 --and id!=6
list.label: Estatus
list.name: estatus
